home.title: Intelligent Triage for Smarter, Faster Healthcare
home.description: TriageSenseAI provides an explainable, real-time, and resource-aware platform to revolutionize patient care decisions.
home.features_description: Our platform is built on three core pillars to ensure efficient, transparent, and effective healthcare delivery.
home.feature_1_description: Leverage machine learning to accurately classify patient risk in real-time.
home.feature_2_description: Understand the "why" behind every AI decision with clear, actionable explanations.
home.feature_3_description: Optimize patient flow by considering real-time hospital resource availability.

physician.title: Physician Dashboard
physician.description: Monitor assigned patients, update your status, and review AI diagnostic insights.

patient.title: Patient Dashboard
patient.description: Track your current triage status and view personal health records.

staff.title: Staff Dashboard
staff.description: Manage incoming cases and monitor resource allocation.
